name: Beat the wizard tower
description:
This is the demo of Beat the wizard tower. You can play one full dungeon with boss. Rooms are random generated so you can play multiple times with a different layout! You get to play 1 out of the 4 characters at start. 

Estimated Release date: August 2023

Kickstarter page:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/sorceressgamelab/beat-the-wizard-tower?ref=...

A few of the pledge goals:

- get the game

- design a weapon pattern with me(limited amount)

- Beta tester

- stretch goal surprises!!!

Beat the wizard tower is a roguelike dungeon crawler game. You are an adventurer who came across a wizard tower to defeat the evil demon! Explore mighty dungeons, collect loot and magic weapons. Fight bosses at the end of each dungeon to get to the next level. Higher levels mean more dangerous dungeons!

CONTROLS:

Mouse+ keyboard

Mouse: move mouse to use the target cursor

Left mouse button: shoot!

Arrow keys/WASD: move in 4 directions

E : open chests

Tab: Mini map

ESC: options/quit game

Features:

- random generated rooms allow for more replay value

- 5 different dungeon themes with bosses at the end of each level

- minimap teleport: not only will the minimap guide you through large dungeons but you can also teleport to rooms that are already explored for quicker moving!

- magic weapons: magic weapons have a design pattern. Each unique to its own!

- Character selection: select from 4 different characters at start!

- Highscore table: Scores will be saved and displayed on the highscore table. Can you beat your own or your friends highscore?

Gameplay:

The heart of the game is exploring the mysterious dungeons. Rooms are hidden and will only be revealed when the doors open.  Find treasure chests along with way to help you replenish mana and health. If you are lucky you can find new magic weapons!

Magic weapons:

Magic weapons can have a pattern such as shapes like circles, weapon shape like an axe or sword. Not only enemies can have magic weapons but the player as well! Magic weapons are rare and hidden in chests. Chests can also contain mana or hearts for life!

Your goal will be to get through the dungeon maze, fight the boss and get to the next level. The higher the dungeon level, the bigger and more dangerous the dungeons are!

For now the completed game will contain 5 dungeon levels with the following themes:

- Maze of the Minotaur

- Deep Caves

- Dungeon of the Ice Golem

- Spider Queens Nest

- Ancient Ruins Dungeon
